bibl.title: A New Fragment from Herodas' Mimes and a Snippet of Homer (P.CtYBR inv. 457).
bibl.note: 1. P. CtYBR [P. Yale] Inv. 457 recto. Herodas 2.69-83. Provenance unknown, 1st c. BC - early 1st c. AD. First published as P. Yale I, 8 (""unknown text in hexameters"") [= M.-P.3 1981.3; LDAB 6805]. - Inv. 457 verso. Iliad 6.232-249 [= M.-P.3 785.1; LDAB 2330]. Provenance unknown, late 1st c. BC - early 1st c. AD. - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: Rodney Ast, A New Fragment from Herodas' Mimes and a Snippet of Homer (P.CtYBR inv. 457).
